name: SnowReportforBorealMountain
0:
”Alexa, ask Boreal Mountain for the snow report”
”Alexa, open Boreal Mountain”
”Alexa, ask Boreal Mountain for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boreal mountain
des: The Boreal Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
